plays.text: Penalty to Marcus Ragnarsson 2 minutes for Holding Marian Gaborik
Penalty to Brad Stuart 2 minutes for Tripping Andrew Brunette
Goal scored by Darby Hendrickson assisted by Aaron Gavey
Penalty to Ladislav Benysek 2 minutes for Tripping Patrick Marleau
Penalty to ROMAN SIMICEK 2 minutes for Holding Mike Ricci
Penalty to Willie Mitchell 2 minutes for Holding Mike Ricci
Penalty to Marco Sturm 2 minutes for Hooking Darby Hendrickson
Goal scored by Jim Dowd unassisted
